description:
Ryohei continues his battle with Vyshana. Vyshana attacks with his Storm Snake and his eight Storm Stag Beetles. In response, Ryohei fights back like a boxer and gets back up from his box weapon.  Ryohei looks like he`s at a disadvantage, but the attacks with his Sun flames begin to take effect! Vyshana becomes cornered. Irie receives an emergency transmission from him and finally decides to use his own box weapon in order to secure the safety of his lab…
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Le secret de la base Melone
